description: Gerrit-Jan van Dorsten is charged with unlawful detention, child abuse and money laundering.
title: Dutch farm case: Father beat children to ward off 'bad spirits', court hears
title_page: Dutch farm case: Father beat children to ward off 'bad spirits', court hears - BBC News
maintext: Van Dorsten did not attend the hearing for medical reasons. He is currently in a prison hospital, where police have been unable to question him because a stroke that he had in 2014, which was left untreated, has left him unable to speak.
